LightningComponentBundle.description: Embed a card or page from Domo with filtering support.

property.label: Filter Column
property.name: filterColumn
property.description: Domo column to filter on (e.g., Id, Account.Id)

property.label: Filter Value Field
property.name: filterValueField
property.description: Salesforce field API name to get filter value from current record (e.g., Id, AccountId, Account.Id)
